TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 事件或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event or event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 事件由 方法引发，并通知连接进程已开始（例如，用户已选择控件并单击了连接谓词），但尚未完成。The event is raised by the method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed. 事件提供了在连接完成前取消连接的机会。The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete. 如果连接成功完成，则此事件后跟 事件。If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the event. 此 事件由 方法引发，它指示用户单击了断开连接谓词，或已 调用方法。The event is raised by the method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the method has otherwise been called. 事件提供了一种方法，可在连接完成前取消结束连接的过程。The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete. 如果连接成功结束，则此事件后跟 事件。If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the event. 引发或事件时，将调用在委托中指定的方法 。The method specified in the delegate is called when a or event is raised. 页面开发人员可以通过将 `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` 和 `OnWebPartsConnecting` 属性添加到 `` 元素，并为属性分配自定义方法名称，为事件添加自定义处理程序。Page developers can add custom handlers for the events by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` and `OnWebPartsConnecting` attributes to the `` element, and assigning custom method names to the attributes. 还可以通过编程方式分配自定义处理程序。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 有关如何订阅事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何：引发和使用事件](/dotnet/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events)。For more information about how to subscribe to an event, see [How to: Raise and Consume Events](/dotnet/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events).
